fix.after:
from dataclasses import dataclass

@dataclass
class Player:
    name: str = ""
    team: str = ""
    th: int = 0
    train_dept: bool = False
    _8_9: bool = True
    _9_10: bool = True
    count: int = 0
    injury: bool = False

violations.line:
class Match:
    def __init__(self):
        self.team = []
        self.time = ()
        self.place = ""
        self.main_ref = []
        self.assi_ref = []
        self.wait_ref = []
        self.video = []
        self.carry = []

fix.after:
from dataclasses import dataclass, field

@dataclass
class Match:
    team: list = field(default_factory=list)
    time: tuple = ()
    place: str = ""
    main_ref: list = field(default_factory=list)
    assi_ref: list = field(default_factory=list)
    wait_ref: list = field(default_factory=list)
    video: list = field(default_factory=list)
    carry: list = field(default_factory=list)
